summary: An email from FBI New York regarding coordination for an upcoming meeting with the SSRA (likely Special Surveillance and Reconnaissance Activity or similar) at an airport to begin work, with reference to attached personnel summary and verification of accuracy.

persons.name: FBI New York
persons.context: Sender of the email coordinating with SSRA for an airport meeting to begin work.

events.title: Airport meeting with SSRA
events.description: The SSRA will meet FBI personnel at an airport to begin their work.

keyFacts: Email dated August 7, 2019, from FBI New York regarding coordination with SSRA.
SSRA scheduled to meet FBI at an airport on August 8, 2019, to begin work.
Reference to an attached document (likely a summary of Epstein personnel) with request to verify accuracy.
Involvement of FBI Squad C-20 (Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking) in New York.
Email indicates ongoing investigative activity related to Epstein case in August 2019.
